评论详情: I really like this mini skirt it has helped since my weight fluctuates all the time so it ALWAYS fits me and on top of that it’s cute.. I recommend!!
Not the same fabric as pictured but okay, I returned it.

I wore this skirt to an Evanescence concert, and while it looked beautiful, I had mixed feelings about it. The material was soft, stretchy, and comfortable, but I was expecting something with a bit more structure to hold the pleated look better. It ended up being shorter and less fluffy than it appeared in the pictures, which made it feel simpler than I had hoped for. Overall, it's a decent skirt, but not quite what I was expecting in terms of style.
I mean it looks short in the photo but your buttcheeks will definitely be saying hello. Decent quality though.
